TopicTitle: Mission - Ferry a VIP safely to her destination

Articles.Content:
Hi All,

I'm new to Kerbal Space Program and try to do as many missions as possible to learn more. But the new mission "Ferry a VIP safely to her destination - Haigy's Travel Itinerary - Suborbital spacelight on Kerbin" I have no idea what and how to do it. Googled it but no results.

Would be great if you could give me a guideline or point out to a tutorial. Many Thanks.

If there is no other instruction about the mission then just make a 2 seated rocket, put any kerbonaut and Haigy inside and launch for a suborbital flight (just get your apoapsis over 70km, no need to circularise)

For tutorials, Scott Manley has a very good tutorial series on YouTube for beginners in 1.0.

First episode here:

Step 1: Accept the contract.

Step 2: Build a rocket or spaceplane that can get above the atmosphere (aka get above 70k elevation). Look at other guides for rocket building.

Step 3: Have either 2 crew slots, or 1 crew slot and a probe core. Put the tourist in one of the crew slots, put a pilot in the other if needed.

Step 4: Bring the rocket up to above 70k to count as suborbital flight. Orbiting is not needed.

Step 5: Land safely.

Step 6: Profit!
